assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: 多个SNMP v1请求处理漏洞

description.html: 简单网络管理协议(SNMP)为监测系统（管理员）提供机制，以发送信息至其他操作系统（代理）中。这些称作请求信息。他们通常用于查询设备的状态。他们也用于配置设备。通过发送未妥善编码的请求信息，可利用各种SNMP代理执行。这可能包含拒绝服务和缓冲区溢出攻击。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: 多个SNMP v1请求处理漏洞

steps.html:
如果不需要SNMP，将在设备上禁用此服务。请参考设备厂商说明，安装相关补助禁用SNMP。

更多有关获取此问题修补程序的详情，请参考：CERT/CC意见 ( http://www.cert.org/advisories/CA-2002-03.html#vendors )
steps.text:
If SNMP is not required, the service should be disabled on the device. Please refer to the device manufacturer's documentation for the steps involved with disabling SNMP.

For information on obtaining a fix for this problem, please refer to theCERT/CC advisory (http://www.cert.org/advisories/CA-2002-03.html#vendors) ( http://www.cert.org/advisories/CA-2002-03.html#vendors )

summary.html: 修复多个SNMP v1请求处理漏洞
summary.text: Fix Multiple SNMP v1 Request Handling Vulnerabilities

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: SSH服务器支持SSH协议v1客户端

description.html: SSH服务器支持SSH版本1客户端。 SSH协议第1版包含基本的漏洞，这些漏洞使会话易受中间人攻击。由于所有现代的SSH客户端最少5年都支持SSH V2，没有理由支持SSHv1。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: SSH服务器支持SSH协议v1客户端

steps.html:
将ssh服务器配置为仅支持协议版本2。 对基于OpenSSH的 服务器,将sshd_config文件中的 "Protocol"行更改为可读取。

协议2

对于不基于openssh的系统,可能需要升级操作系统版本以启用SSHv2支持。
steps.text:
Configure the SSH server to support protocol version 2 only. For OpenSSH-based servers, change the "Protocol" line in the sshd_config file to read: 

Protocol 2

 For systems not based on OpenSSH, you may need to upgrade the operating system version to enable SSHv2 support.

summary.html: 配置的SSH服务器仅支持协议v2
summary.text: Configure SSH server to support protocol v2 only

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: X.509 Certificate Subject CN 与实体名称不匹配

description.html:
X.509 证书中的对象常用名 (CN) 字段与出示证书的实体名称不匹配。

颁发证书之前，证书颁发机构 (CA) 必须检查实体的身份，要求CA 的认证实施细则 (CPS)中指定的证书。因此，标准证书验证程序需要出示证书的对象常用名字段来匹配出示证书实体的实际名称。例如，在"https://www.example.com/"出品的证书中，CN 应该是"www.example.com"。

为检测和防止活跃的窃听攻击，必须验证证书的有效性，否则攻击者可发起中间人攻击并完全控制流数据。特别重要的是对象CN的有效性应该匹配实体 （主机名） 的名称。

由于配置错误，经常发生CN不匹配的情况，虽然这也表示进行中间人攻击。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: X.509 Certificate Subject CN 与实体名称不匹配

steps.html: 应对X.509证书内的对象通用名（CN）字段进行修复，以反映提供证书的实体名称(如主机名)。这通常是通过生成一个人由客户端和服务器所信任的证书颁发机构(CA）颁发的新证书来完成。
steps.text: The subject's common name (CN) field in the X.509 certificate should be fixed to reflect the name of the entity presenting the certificate (e.g., the hostname). This is done by generating a new certificate usually signed by a Certification Authority (CA) trusted by both the client and server.

summary.html: 修复证书内主题通用名(CN)字段
summary.text: Fix the subject's Common Name (CN) field in the certificate

description.html: OpenSSL 0.9.8za之前版本, 1.0.0 到1.0.0m, 和1.0.1到1.0.1h版本未能适当限制ChangeCipherSpec的消息的处理，这使得中间攻击者触发在某些OpenSSL到OpenSSL的通信中使用零长度主键，从而通过特制的TLS握手，又名" CCS注射"漏洞劫持会话或获取敏感信息。

additionalInformation.html: 升级到 OpenSSL的0.9.8za版本。此版本的源代码可以从以下地址下载 OpenSSL的网站。要获得您所用平台的二进制，请访问供应商的网站。请注意，许多操作系统供应商选择应用最新的OpenSSL安全补丁到它们的分布中，而不更改程序包版本到最新的OpenSSL版本号。
additionalInformation.text: Upgrade to version 0.9.8za of OpenSSL (http://www.openssl.org). The source code for this release can be downloaded from OpenSSL's website (http://ftp.openssl.org/source/openssl-0.9.8za.tar.gz). To obtain binaries for your platform, please visit your vendor's site. Please note that many operating system vendors choose to apply the most recent OpenSSL security patches to their distributions without changing the package version to the most recent OpenSSL version number.

steps.html: 从以下地址下载并进行更新和升级: http://ftp.openssl.org/source/openssl-0.9.8za.tar.gz
steps.text: Download and apply the upgrade from: http://ftp.openssl.org/source/openssl-0.9.8za.tar.gz (http://ftp.openssl.org/source/openssl-0.9.8za.tar.gz)

description.html: 服务器的TLS/SSL认证是由不有名或不受信任的Certification Authority（CA）签署的。 这可能发生以下情况，如果：chain/intermediate认证丢失、过期或已被吊销;服务器主机名不匹配认证中的配置;时间/日期是不正确的;或自我签名认证被使用。不推荐使用自我签名认证，因为它可能表明一个TLS/SSL中间人攻击正在发生。

steps.html:
获取一份由受信任颁发机构CA颁发的新证书，如Thawte 或者Verisign.

获取新证书所需的精确指令取决于组织要求。一般情况下，需要生成一个一个证书请求，并将此请求保存为一个文件。这个文件之后会被发往至某个认证中心进行处理。你从认证中心接收到新的证书文件后，你将必须将其安装在TLS/SSL服务器上。用于专门查询的功能是OpenDataSource和OpenRowset。安装证书用的准确指令因产品而异。遵循文件说明。
steps.text:
Ensure the common name (CN) reflects the name of the entity presenting the certificate (e.g., the hostname). If the certificate(s) or any of the chain certificate(s) have expired or been revoked, obtain a new certificate from your  Certificate Authority (CA) by following their documentation. If a self-signed certificate is being used, consider obtaining  a signed certificate from a CA. 

 References: Mozilla: Connection Untrusted Error (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/connection-untrusted-error-message)SSLShopper: SSL Certificate Not Trusted Error (https://www.sslshopper.com/ssl-certificate-not-trusted-error.html)Windows/IIS certificate chain config (https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/954755)Apache SSL config (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_ssl.html)Nginx SSL config (http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/configuring_https_servers.html)CertificateChain.io (https://certificatechain.io/)

summary.html: 由受信任颁发机构CA重新在证书上签字。
summary.text: Obtain a new certificate from your CA and ensure the server configuration is correct

description.html: 最近的密码分析结果利用RC4密钥流中的偏倚来恢复重复加密的明文。因此，RC4不能再被视为为SSL/TLS会话提供足够的安全级别。它具有许多单字节偏移，这使远程攻击者更容易通过使用相同明文的大量会话中的密文统计分析来进行明文恢复攻击。

steps.html:
配置服务器以禁用对RC4密码的支持。

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章 245030获取有关禁用rc4密码的说明 。

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

请参阅服务器供应商文档以应用推荐的密码配置：

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK
steps.text:
Configure the server to disable support for RC4 ciphers.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling rc4 ciphers. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK

summary.html: 禁用禁用RC4密码的SSL支持
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for RC4 ciphers

description.html: 在Microsoft Windows和浏览器（如Microsoft Internet Explorer，Mozilla Firefox，Google Chrome，Opera（和其他协商SSL连接的产品）的某些配置中使用的SSL协议会使用CBC模式与链接的初始化向量对数据进行加密。这可能允许中间人攻击者通过HTTPS会话上的块选择边界攻击（BCBA），使用（1）HTML5 WebSocket API的JavaScript代码，（2）Java URLConnection API，或（3）Silverlight WebClient API，又称为"BEAST"攻击。通过支持受影响的协议和密码，服务器使客户端得到利用。

steps.html: 服务端不会减轻对BEAST的攻击。唯一的选择是禁用受影响的协议(SSLv3和TLS 1.0)。最安全的配置是使用含关联数据的身份认证加密(AEAD)，例如TLS 1.2中的AES-GCM, AES-CCM。
steps.text: There is no server-side mitigation available against the BEAST attack. The only option is to disable the affected protocols (SSLv3 and TLS 1.0). The only fully safe configuration is to use Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD), e.g. AES-GCM, AES-CCM in TLS 1.2.

summary.html: 禁用SSLv2、SSLv3和TLS 1.0。最佳方法是只启用TLS 1.2。
summary.text: Disable SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLS 1.0. The best solution is to only have TLS 1.2 enabled

description.html:
SSLv3协议和支持密码都患有严重的漏洞，使得该协议的安全不使用。

支付卡行业（PCI）数据安全标准要求至少TLS v1.1，并建议TLS v1.2。此外，FIPS 140-2标准还要求至少TLS v1.1，并建议TLS v1.2。

steps.html: 将服务器配置为要求客户端使用带有Associated Data (AEAD)功能的密码的经过身份验证的加密的TLS版本1.2。
steps.text: Configure the server to require clients to use TLS version 1.2 using Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) capable ciphers.

summary.html: 禁用不安全的TLS/SSL协议支持
summary.text: Disable insecure TLS/SSL protocol support

description.html: PCI (Payment Card Industry)数据安全标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。 除此之外，FIPS 140-2标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。

steps.html: 将服务器配置为要求客户端使用带有Associated Data (AEAD)功能的密码的经过身份验证的加密的TLS版本1.2。
steps.text: Configure the server to require clients to use TLS version 1.2 using Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) capable ciphers.

summary.html: 禁用不安全的TLS/SSL协议支持
summary.text: Disable insecure TLS/SSL protocol support

description.html:
利用安全套接层（SSL）3.0与密码链接（CBC）模式密码的所有系统和应用程序可能会受到POODLE（Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption）攻击的影响。SSL 3.0漏洞源于SSL协议中特定类型的加密算法对数据块的加密方式。 POODLE攻击利用SSL中内置的协议版本协商功能强制使用SSL 3.0，然后利用此新漏洞解密SSL会话中的选择内容。

       支付卡行业（PCI）数据安全标准要求至少为TLS v1.1并推荐TLS v1.2。此外，FIPS 140-2标准还要求至少TLS v1.1并推荐TLS v1.2。

steps.html: 将服务器配置为要求客户端使用带有Associated Data (AEAD)功能的密码的经过身份验证的加密的TLS版本1.2。
steps.text: Configure the server to require clients to use TLS version 1.2 using Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) capable ciphers.

summary.html: 禁用不安全的TLS/SSL协议支持
summary.text: Disable insecure TLS/SSL protocol support

description.html: TLS服务器使用长度小于1024位的素质模数的Diffie-Hellman组。目前的估计是，学术团队可以打破768位素数，国家级的行为者可以打破1024位素数。

steps.html: 请参考指南为TLS部署Diffie-Hellman，有关如何配置服务器使用2048位或更强的Diffie-Hellman组。
steps.text: Please refer to this guide to deploying Diffie-Hellman for TLS (https://weakdh.org/sysadmin.html) for instructions on how to configure the server to use 2048-bit or stronger Diffie-Hellman groups with safe primes.

summary.html: 使用强Diffie-Hellman组
summary.text: Use a Stronger Diffie-Hellman Group

description.html: TLS服务器使用长度小于2048位的素质模数的Diffie-Hellman组。目前的估计是，学术团队可以打破768位素数，国家级的行为者可以打破1024位素数。

steps.html: 请参考指南为TLS部署Diffie-Hellman，有关如何配置服务器使用2048位或更强的Diffie-Hellman组。
steps.text: Please refer to this guide to deploying Diffie-Hellman for TLS (https://weakdh.org/sysadmin.html) for instructions on how to configure the server to use 2048-bit or stronger Diffie-Hellman groups with safe primes.

summary.html: 使用强Diffie-Hellman组
summary.text: Use a Stronger Diffie-Hellman Group

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: TLS/SSL时序旁道攻击,即"Lucky Thirteen"攻击

description.html:
OpenSSL、OpenJDK、PolarSSL和其他产品中使用的 TLS 协议1.1和1.2以及 DTLS 协议1.0和1.2，在处理格式错误的CBC填充期间对MAC检查需求没有适当地考虑定时边信道攻击， 允许远程攻击者通过对特制数据包的定时数据的统计分析来进行区分攻击和明文恢复攻击，也就是“幸运十三人” 问题。 包含了以前的填充预言攻击的对策的 SSL 3.0和TLS 1.0的实现方案也可能发生这种攻击。 变体攻击也可能适用于不合规的实现。由于无法确定某个特定的SSL产品或此类产品的易受攻击版本是否在端点上处于活动状态，因此运行CBC密码套件的所有SSL端点都被标记为可能存在漏洞; 因此他们应该由最终用户进行调查。

OpenSSL、OpenJDK、PolarSSL和其他产品中使用的 TLS 协议1.1和1.2以及 DTLS 协议1.0和1.2，在处理格式错误的CBC填充期间对MAC检查需求没有适当地考虑定时边信道攻击， 允许远程攻击者通过对特制数据包的定时数据的统计分析来进行区分攻击和明文恢复攻击，也就是“幸运十三人” 问题。 包含了以前的填充预言攻击的对策的 SSL 3.0和TLS 1.0的实现方案也可能发生这种攻击。 变体攻击也可能适用于不合规的实现。由于无法确定某个特定的SSL产品或此类产品的易受攻击版本是否在端点上处于活动状态，因此运行CBC密码套件的所有SSL端点都被标记为可能存在漏洞；因此他们应该由最终用户进行调查。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: TLS/SSL时序旁道攻击,即"Lucky Thirteen"攻击

steps.html:
以下列表显示发布的版本补丁。安装补丁版本或最新版本。

  • OpenSSL: 1.0.1d, 1.0.0k和0.9.8y
  • NSS: 3.14.3
  • GnuTLS: 2.12.23, 3.0.28和3.1.7
  • PolarSSL: 1.2.5
  • CyaSSL: 2.5.0
  • MatrixSSL: 3.4.1
  • BouncyCastle: 1.48
  • Oracle (Java):已解决JavaSE的特殊重要补丁更新中的攻击released 19/02/2013.

如果补丁不能配置服务器以使用GCM密码和禁用CBC密码。也就是说，使用含 Associated Data (AEAD),例如AES-GCM, AES-CCM的验证加密。
steps.text:
The following list shows for which version patches were released. Install the patched version or the latest version.

  * OpenSSL: 1.0.1d, 1.0.0k and 0.9.8y

  * NSS: 3.14.3

  * GnuTLS: 2.12.23, 3.0.28 and 3.1.7

  * PolarSSL: 1.2.5

  * CyaSSL: 2.5.0

  * MatrixSSL: 3.4.1

  * BouncyCastle: 1.48

  * Oracle (Java): the attacks are addressed in a special critical patch update of JavaSE, released 19/02/2013 (http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/javacpufeb2013update-1905892.html).

If patches are not available configure the server to use GCM ciphers and disable CBC ciphers. In other words, use Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD), e.g. AES-GCM, AES-CCM.

steps.html:

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

steps.text:
Configure the server to disable support for static key cipher suites.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling static key cipher suites. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

description.html:
远程主机响应ICMP时间戳的一个请求。在ICMP时间戳回应包含远程主机的日期和时间。此信息理论上可能用来对付一些系统，去利用在其他设备中的微弱的期限随机数发生器。

此外，某些操作系统的版本可以通过分析他们对无效的ICMP时间戳请求的反应，精确地采取指纹。

steps.html:
执行以下命令：

ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Execute the following command:

 ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用HP/UX的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on HP/UX

steps.html:
用ACL阻止13型和14型ICMP。例如：

   deny icmp any any 13
   deny icmp any any 14

注意，一般情况下最好采用能通过默认值阻止全部的ACL，然后选择性地允许特定类型的通信。例如，阻止全部，然后仅允许ICMP不可达、ICMP回波应答、ICMP超时和ICMP源抑制：

   permit icmp any any unreachable
   permit icmp any any echo-reply
   permit icmp any any time-exceeded
   permit icmp any any source-quench

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Use ACLs to block ICMP types 13 and 14. For example:

   deny icmp any any 13

   deny icmp any any 14

Note that it is generally preferable to use ACLs that block everything by default and then selectively allow certain types of traffic in. For example, block everything and then only allow ICMP unreachable, ICMP echo reply, ICMP time exceeded, and ICMP source quench:

   permit icmp any any unreachable

   permit icmp any any echo-reply

   permit icmp any any time-exceeded

   permit icmp any any source-quench

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Cisco IOS的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Cisco IOS

steps.html:
IRIX不提供禁用ICMP时间戳响应的途径。因此，应采用ipfilterd和/或通过防火墙阻断受影响主机的ICMP。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
IRIX does not offer a way to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using ipfilterd, and/or block it at any external firewalls.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用SGI Irix的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on SGI Irix

steps.html:
Linux既不提供sysctl也不提供/proc/sys/net/ipv4接口使ICMP时间戳响应禁用。因此，应采用iptables和/或通过防火墙阻止受影响的主机的ICMP。例如：

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP
   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Linux offers neither a sysctl nor a /proc/sys/net/ipv4 interface to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using iptables, and/or block it at the firewall. For example:

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP

   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Linux的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Linux

steps.html:

steps.text:

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

steps.text:
Set the "net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl" sysctl variable to 0.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

steps.html:
正确配置的PIX防火墙可以不响应ICMP数据包的外部接口。在PIX软件版本4.1（6）直到5.2.1，ICMP可以访问PIX的内部接口，PIX不能配置为不响应。在PIX软件版本5.2.1开始，内部接口仍然默认是ICMP，但其内部接口的ICMP响应可以用ICMP命令禁用，如下，在<inside>是内部接口的名称:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>
   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

完成配置后不要忘记保存

更多信息查看Cisco的支持文档Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall

最简单和最有效的解决方案是配置你的 防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP报文和ICMP 类型13（时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
A properly configured PIX firewall should never respond to ICMP packets on its external interface. In PIX Software versions 4.1(6) until 5.2.1, ICMP traffic to the PIX's internal interface is permitted; the PIX cannot be configured to NOT respond. Beginning in PIX Software version 5.2.1, ICMP is still permitted on the internal interface by default, but ICMP responses from its internal interfaces can be disabled with the icmp command, as follows, where <inside> is the name of the internal interface:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>

   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

Don't forget to save the configuration when you are finished.

See Cisco's support document Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall (http://www.cisco.com/warp/public/110/31.html) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

steps.html:
ICMP时间戳响应可通过netsh命令行公用程序禁用。

  1. 进入Windows控制面板。
  2. 选择"Windows Firewall".
  3. 在Windows Firewall选项框中，选择"更改设置"。
  4. 通过选择"(推荐)" 选项启用防火墙。
  5. 打开命令提示符。
  6. 输入"防火墙设置icmpsetting 13 禁用"

更多信息请参照：http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled via the netsh command line utility.

  1. Go to the Windows Control Panel.

  2. Select "Windows Firewall".

  3. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Change Settings".

  4. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  5. Open a Command Prompt.

  6. Enter "netsh firewall set icmpsetting 13 disable"

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

steps.html:
使用IPSec过滤器功能定义和实现一个IP筛选列表阻止ICMP13、14类型。注意，在"网络和拨号连接"控制面板的标准TCP/IP的阻止能力不能阻止ICMP（只能阻止TCP 和UDP）。IPSec过滤器的功能与IPSec严格标准相关，允许选择性地阻断这些ICMP包。 更多信息请查阅http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（子网掩码请求）和14（子网掩码响应）的ICMP 包。
steps.text:
Use the IPSec filter feature to define and apply an IP filter list that blocks ICMP types 13 and 14. Note that the standard TCP/IP blocking capability under the "Networking and Dialup Connections" control panel is NOT capable of blocking ICMP (only TCP and UDP). The IPSec filter features, while they may seem strictly related to the IPSec standards, will allow you to selectively block these ICMP packets. Seehttp://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

  1. 进入网络连接控制面板。
  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties. 右键单击"网络适配器"，选择"属性"，或选择"网络适配器"和选择"文件"->"属性"。
  3. 选择 "高级" tab.
  4. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  5. 选择"常规" tab.
  6. 选择"on (recommended)"选项，开启防火墙.
  7. 选择 "高级" tab.
  8. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  9. 取消 "允许传入的时间戳请求" 选项.
  10. 选择"OK"退出ICMP 设置窗口，保存退出.
  11. 选择"OK" 退出Windows防火墙窗口保存设置.
  12. 选择"OK" 退出网络是配置窗口.

更多信息请看:http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled by deselecting the "allow incoming timestamp request" option in the ICMP configuration panel of Windows Firewall.

  1. Go to the Network Connections control panel.

  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties.

  3. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  4. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Settings".

  5. Select the "General" tab.

  6. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  7. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  8. In the ICMP box, select "Settings".

  9. Deselect (uncheck) the "Allow incoming timestamp request" option.

  10. Select "OK" to exit the ICMP Settings dialog and save the settings.

  11. Select "OK" to exit the Windows Firewall dialog and save the settings.

  12. Select "OK" to exit the internet adapter dialog.

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

description.html: OpenSSH 6.9以及早前版本的sshd的auth2-chall.c中的kbdint_next_device函数没有合理限制对单个连接中的键盘交互设备的处理，这更便于远程攻击者通过ssh-oKbdInteractiveDevices选项中长的和重复的列表执行暴力破解攻击或导致拒绝服务（CPU消耗），如修改的客户端所示，该客户端为此列表上的每个pam元素提供不同的密码。

additionalInformation.html:
OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
additionalInformation.text:
The latest version of OpenSSH is 7.6.

 While you can always build OpenSSH from source (http://www.openssh.com/portable.html), many platforms and distributions provide pre-built binary packages for OpenSSH. These pre-built packages are usually customized and optimized for a particular distribution, therefore we recommend that you use the packages if they are available for your operating system.

description.html: AT&T Virtual Network Computing (VNC)允许远程用户访问安装系统。如果此服务被破坏,用户可以完全控制系统。

steps.html:
移除或禁用此服务。如必要，设置合适（难破解）密码。需注意VNC将密码缩短至8个字节验证时，尽量使其不易破解。

为保护eaves-droppers的资料,tunnelingVNC至SSH推荐。

另外,还推荐限制访问特殊的IP地址。

使用TPC包装器

更多VNC信息，请访问VNC website.
steps.text:
Remove or disable this service. If it is necessary, be sure to use well thought out (hard to crack) passwords. It is important to note that VNC truncates passwords to 8 bytes (http://www.realvnc.com/faq.html#password8can) when authenticating, making it more susceptible to brute force attacks.

To protect data from eaves-droppers, tunneling VNC through SSH (http://www.realvnc.com/faq.html#firewall) is recommended.

Additionally, restricting access to specific IP addresses using TCP wrappers (http://www.uk.research.att.com/vnc/extras.html#tcpwrapper) is also recommended.

For more information on VNC, visit the VNC website (http://www.realvnc.com/).

description.html:
远程主机响应ICMP时间戳的一个请求。在ICMP时间戳回应包含远程主机的日期和时间。此信息理论上可能用来对付一些系统，去利用在其他设备中的微弱的期限随机数发生器。

此外，某些操作系统的版本可以通过分析他们对无效的ICMP时间戳请求的反应，精确地采取指纹。

steps.html:
执行以下命令：

ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Execute the following command:

 ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用HP/UX的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on HP/UX

steps.html:
用ACL阻止13型和14型ICMP。例如：

   deny icmp any any 13
   deny icmp any any 14

注意，一般情况下最好采用能通过默认值阻止全部的ACL，然后选择性地允许特定类型的通信。例如，阻止全部，然后仅允许ICMP不可达、ICMP回波应答、ICMP超时和ICMP源抑制：

   permit icmp any any unreachable
   permit icmp any any echo-reply
   permit icmp any any time-exceeded
   permit icmp any any source-quench

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Use ACLs to block ICMP types 13 and 14. For example:

   deny icmp any any 13

   deny icmp any any 14

Note that it is generally preferable to use ACLs that block everything by default and then selectively allow certain types of traffic in. For example, block everything and then only allow ICMP unreachable, ICMP echo reply, ICMP time exceeded, and ICMP source quench:

   permit icmp any any unreachable

   permit icmp any any echo-reply

   permit icmp any any time-exceeded

   permit icmp any any source-quench

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Cisco IOS的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Cisco IOS

steps.html:
IRIX不提供禁用ICMP时间戳响应的途径。因此，应采用ipfilterd和/或通过防火墙阻断受影响主机的ICMP。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
IRIX does not offer a way to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using ipfilterd, and/or block it at any external firewalls.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用SGI Irix的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on SGI Irix

steps.html:
Linux既不提供sysctl也不提供/proc/sys/net/ipv4接口使ICMP时间戳响应禁用。因此，应采用iptables和/或通过防火墙阻止受影响的主机的ICMP。例如：

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP
   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
Linux offers neither a sysctl nor a /proc/sys/net/ipv4 interface to disable ICMP timestamp responses. Therefore, you should block ICMP on the affected host using iptables, and/or block it at the firewall. For example:

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP

   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Linux的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Linux

steps.html:

steps.text:
Windows NT 4 does not provide a way to block ICMP packets. Therefore, you should block them at the firewall.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Windows NT 4的ICMP时间戳响应

steps.html:

steps.text:
Set the "net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl" sysctl variable to 0.

   sysctl -w net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl=0

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用OpenBSD的TCMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on OpenBSD

steps.html:
正确配置的PIX防火墙可以不响应ICMP数据包的外部接口。在PIX软件版本4.1（6）直到5.2.1，ICMP可以访问PIX的内部接口，PIX不能配置为不响应。在PIX软件版本5.2.1开始，内部接口仍然默认是ICMP，但其内部接口的ICMP响应可以用ICMP命令禁用，如下，在<inside>是内部接口的名称:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>
   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

完成配置后不要忘记保存

更多信息查看Cisco的支持文档Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall

最简单和最有效的解决方案是配置你的 防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP报文和ICMP 类型13（时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。
steps.text:
A properly configured PIX firewall should never respond to ICMP packets on its external interface. In PIX Software versions 4.1(6) until 5.2.1, ICMP traffic to the PIX's internal interface is permitted; the PIX cannot be configured to NOT respond. Beginning in PIX Software version 5.2.1, ICMP is still permitted on the internal interface by default, but ICMP responses from its internal interfaces can be disabled with the icmp command, as follows, where <inside> is the name of the internal interface:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>

   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

Don't forget to save the configuration when you are finished.

See Cisco's support document Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall (http://www.cisco.com/warp/public/110/31.html) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

summary.html: 禁用Cisco PIX的ICMP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable ICMP timestamp responses on Cisco PIX

steps.html:
ICMP时间戳响应可通过netsh命令行公用程序禁用。

  1. 进入Windows控制面板。
  2. 选择"Windows Firewall".
  3. 在Windows Firewall选项框中，选择"更改设置"。
  4. 通过选择"(推荐)" 选项启用防火墙。
  5. 打开命令提示符。
  6. 输入"防火墙设置icmpsetting 13 禁用"

更多信息请参照：http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled via the netsh command line utility.

  1. Go to the Windows Control Panel.

  2. Select "Windows Firewall".

  3. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Change Settings".

  4. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  5. Open a Command Prompt.

  6. Enter "netsh firewall set icmpsetting 13 disable"

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

steps.html:
使用IPSec过滤器功能定义和实现一个IP筛选列表阻止ICMP13、14类型。注意，在"网络和拨号连接"控制面板的标准TCP/IP的阻止能力不能阻止ICMP（只能阻止TCP 和UDP）。IPSec过滤器的功能与IPSec严格标准相关，允许选择性地阻断这些ICMP包。 更多信息请查阅http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（子网掩码请求）和14（子网掩码响应）的ICMP 包。
steps.text:
Use the IPSec filter feature to define and apply an IP filter list that blocks ICMP types 13 and 14. Note that the standard TCP/IP blocking capability under the "Networking and Dialup Connections" control panel is NOT capable of blocking ICMP (only TCP and UDP). The IPSec filter features, while they may seem strictly related to the IPSec standards, will allow you to selectively block these ICMP packets. Seehttp://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190) for more information.

The easiest and most effective solution is to configure your firewall to block incoming and outgoing ICMP packets with ICMP types 13 (timestamp request) and 14 (timestamp response).

steps.html:
在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。 更多信息请看http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（ICMP时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。

在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。

  1. 进入网络连接控制面板。
  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties. 右键单击"网络适配器"，选择"属性"，或选择"网络适配器"和选择"文件"->"属性"。
  3. 选择 "高级" tab.
  4. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  5. 选择"常规" tab.
  6. 选择"on (recommended)"选项，开启防火墙.
  7. 选择 "高级" tab.
  8. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  9. 取消 "允许传入的时间戳请求" 选项.
  10. 选择"OK"退出ICMP 设置窗口，保存退出.
  11. 选择"OK" 退出Windows防火墙窗口保存设置.
  12. 选择"OK" 退出网络是配置窗口.

更多信息请看:http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
steps.text:
ICMP timestamp responses can be disabled by deselecting the "allow incoming timestamp request" option in the ICMP configuration panel of Windows Firewall.

  1. Go to the Network Connections control panel.

  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties.

  3. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  4. In the Windows Firewall box, select "Settings".

  5. Select the "General" tab.

  6. Enable the firewall by selecting the "on (recommended)" option.

  7. Select the "Advanced" tab.

  8. In the ICMP box, select "Settings".

  9. Deselect (uncheck) the "Allow incoming timestamp request" option.

  10. Select "OK" to exit the ICMP Settings dialog and save the settings.

  11. Select "OK" to exit the Windows Firewall dialog and save the settings.

  12. Select "OK" to exit the internet adapter dialog.

For more information, see: http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true (http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: X.509 Certificate Subject CN 与实体名称不匹配

description.html:
X.509 证书中的对象常用名 (CN) 字段与出示证书的实体名称不匹配。

颁发证书之前，证书颁发机构 (CA) 必须检查实体的身份，要求CA 的认证实施细则 (CPS)中指定的证书。因此，标准证书验证程序需要出示证书的对象常用名字段来匹配出示证书实体的实际名称。例如，在"https://www.example.com/"出品的证书中，CN 应该是"www.example.com"。

为检测和防止活跃的窃听攻击，必须验证证书的有效性，否则攻击者可发起中间人攻击并完全控制流数据。特别重要的是对象CN的有效性应该匹配实体 （主机名） 的名称。

由于配置错误，经常发生CN不匹配的情况，虽然这也表示进行中间人攻击。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: X.509 Certificate Subject CN 与实体名称不匹配

steps.html: 应对X.509证书内的对象通用名（CN）字段进行修复，以反映提供证书的实体名称(如主机名)。这通常是通过生成一个人由客户端和服务器所信任的证书颁发机构(CA）颁发的新证书来完成。
steps.text: The subject's common name (CN) field in the X.509 certificate should be fixed to reflect the name of the entity presenting the certificate (e.g., the hostname). This is done by generating a new certificate usually signed by a Certification Authority (CA) trusted by both the client and server.

summary.html: 修复证书内主题通用名(CN)字段
summary.text: Fix the subject's Common Name (CN) field in the certificate

description.html: HTTP基本认证方案不被认为是用户认证的安全方法（除非与某些外部安全系统（如TLS/SL）结合使用）,因为用户名和密码通过网络作为明文传递。

steps.html: 启用Web服务器上的HTTPS。TLS/SSL协议将保护明文的基本认证凭证。
steps.text: Enable HTTPS on the Web server. The TLS/SSL protocol will protect cleartext Basic Authentication credentials.

summary.html: 在TLS/SSL (HTTPS)上使用基础验证
summary.text: Use Basic Authentication over TLS/SSL (HTTPS)

steps.html: 用另一个摘要认证机制替代基本认证。通过现代密码标准的摘要认证变弱。但出于多个目的，替换基本认证颇有价值。它修复部分基本认证的缺陷。更多信息，详见RFC 2617，部分4. 安全考虑
steps.text: Replace Basic Authentication with the alternative Digest Authentication scheme. By modern cryptographic standards Digest Authentication is weak. But for a large range of purposes it is valuable as a replacement for Basic Authentication. It remedies some, but not all, weaknesses of Basic Authentication. See RFC 2617, section4. Security Considerations (http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2617#section-4) for more information.

summary.html: 使用摘要式身份验证
summary.text: Use Digest Authentication

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Microsoft RDP协议硬代码RSA弱私钥

description.html: 在Microsoft Terminal Server中应用的Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP)执行中使用一个单一的RSA私钥。这个私钥已经被硬编码到可执行的二进制中。这个相同的密钥被Terminal Server的所有安装使用。这意味着一个攻击者可以很容易地通过伪造RDP Server和RDP客户端，以发送到他们的凭据给他来进行中间人攻击。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Microsoft RDP协议硬代码RSA弱私钥

steps.html: 在编写文本时，Microsoft不提供修复此漏洞的补丁。如果不需要RDP服务，请关闭。否则唯一的方法是，强制使用IPSEC来保护所有的RDP通信（通常在TCP端口3389上）。请注意，当攻击者可能在某些网络路由上对合法RDP客户端，而无需发送任何数据包至RDP服务器上，执行中间人攻击时，使用防火墙筛选传入的RDP包没有提供充分的保护。
steps.text: As of this writing, Microsoft has not provided a patch to fix this issue. If the RDP service is not needed, turn it off. Otherwise the only solution is to force the use of IPSEC to protect all RDP communications (typically on TCP port 3389). Note that using a firewall to filter incoming RDP packets is not sufficient protection, as it would still be possible for an attacker somewhere along the network route to conduct an active man-in-the-middle attack against legitimate RDP clients without needing to send any packets to the RDP server.

summary.html: 禁用RDP和使用IPSEC签名和加密RDP通讯
summary.text: Disable RDP or use IPSEC to sign and encrypt RDP communications

description.html: 服务器的TLS/SSL认证是由不有名或不受信任的Certification Authority（CA）签署的。 这可能发生以下情况，如果：chain/intermediate认证丢失、过期或已被吊销;服务器主机名不匹配认证中的配置;时间/日期是不正确的;或自我签名认证被使用。不推荐使用自我签名认证，因为它可能表明一个TLS/SSL中间人攻击正在发生。

steps.html:
获取一份由受信任颁发机构CA颁发的新证书，如Thawte 或者Verisign.

获取新证书所需的精确指令取决于组织要求。一般情况下，需要生成一个一个证书请求，并将此请求保存为一个文件。这个文件之后会被发往至某个认证中心进行处理。你从认证中心接收到新的证书文件后，你将必须将其安装在TLS/SSL服务器上。用于专门查询的功能是OpenDataSource和OpenRowset。安装证书用的准确指令因产品而异。遵循文件说明。
steps.text:
Ensure the common name (CN) reflects the name of the entity presenting the certificate (e.g., the hostname). If the certificate(s) or any of the chain certificate(s) have expired or been revoked, obtain a new certificate from your  Certificate Authority (CA) by following their documentation. If a self-signed certificate is being used, consider obtaining  a signed certificate from a CA. 

 References: Mozilla: Connection Untrusted Error (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/connection-untrusted-error-message)SSLShopper: SSL Certificate Not Trusted Error (https://www.sslshopper.com/ssl-certificate-not-trusted-error.html)Windows/IIS certificate chain config (https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/954755)Apache SSL config (http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/mod_ssl.html)Nginx SSL config (http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/configuring_https_servers.html)CertificateChain.io (https://certificatechain.io/)

summary.html: 由受信任颁发机构CA重新在证书上签字。
summary.text: Obtain a new certificate from your CA and ensure the server configuration is correct

description.html: 具有64位块大小的传统块密码在CBC模式下使用时容易遭受实际的冲突攻击。支持使用3DES作为对称加密密码的密码套件的所有版本的SSL/TLS协议都受到影响。块密码的安全性通常减小到密钥大小k：最佳攻击应该是密钥的穷举搜索，复杂度为k的幂。然而，块大小n也是重要的安全参数，定义了可以在相同密钥下加密的数据量。这在使用常见的操作模式时尤其重要：我们要求块密码是安全的，最多为2个查询功能，但大多数操作模式（例如CBC，CTR，GCM，OCB等）都不安全超过2个功能的半n个消息块（生日绑定）。具有128位块的现代块密码作为AES，生日绑定对应于256个字节。然而，对于具有64位块的块密码，生日限制对应于仅32 GB，这在实践中容易实现。一旦发生两个密码块之间的冲突，就有可能使用冲突来提取纯文本数据。

steps.html:
配置服务器以禁用对3DES套件的支持。

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章           有关禁用3DES加密套件的说明，请查看 245030 。

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。 此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。 而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

请参阅服务器供应商文档以应用推荐的密码配置：

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK
steps.text:
Configure the server to disable support for 3DES suite.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling 3DES cipher suite. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK

summary.html: 对3DES密码套件禁用TLS/SSL支持
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for 3DES cipher suite

description.html: 最近的密码分析结果利用RC4密钥流中的偏倚来恢复重复加密的明文。因此，RC4不能再被视为为SSL/TLS会话提供足够的安全级别。它具有许多单字节偏移，这使远程攻击者更容易通过使用相同明文的大量会话中的密文统计分析来进行明文恢复攻击。

steps.html:
配置服务器以禁用对RC4密码的支持。

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章 245030获取有关禁用rc4密码的说明 。

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

请参阅服务器供应商文档以应用推荐的密码配置：

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK
steps.text:
Configure the server to disable support for RC4 ciphers.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling rc4 ciphers. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK

summary.html: 禁用禁用RC4密码的SSL支持
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for RC4 ciphers

description.html: 服务器的TLS/SSL认证是自我署名的。自我署名的认证不能通过默认信任，尤其是因为TLS/SSL中间人攻击具有代表性的自我署名的认证来窃听TLS/SSL连接。

steps.html: 获取一个非自签名的TLS/SSL服务器证书，并将其安装在服务器上。获取新证书所需的精确指令取决于组织要求。一般情况下，需要生成一个证书请求，并将此请求保存为文件。然后将此文件发送到证书颁发机构（CA）进行处理。这个文件之后会被发往至某个认证中心进行处理。各组织可能有其内部证书颁发机构。如果没有，必须向受信任的证书颁发机构购买，例如Thawte 或者Verisign.
steps.text: Obtain a new TLS/SSL server certificate that is NOT self-signed and install it on the server. The exact instructions for obtaining a new certificate depend on your organization's requirements. Generally, you will need to generate a certificate request and save the request as a file. This file is then sent to a Certificate Authority (CA) for processing. Your organization may have its own internal Certificate Authority. If not, you may have to pay for a certificate from a trusted external Certificate Authority, such as Thawte (http://www.thawte.com) or Verisign (http://www.verisign.com).

summary.html: 更替TLS/SSL自签名证书。
summary.text: Replace TLS/SSL self-signed certificate

description.html: 在Microsoft Windows和浏览器（如Microsoft Internet Explorer，Mozilla Firefox，Google Chrome，Opera（和其他协商SSL连接的产品）的某些配置中使用的SSL协议会使用CBC模式与链接的初始化向量对数据进行加密。这可能允许中间人攻击者通过HTTPS会话上的块选择边界攻击（BCBA），使用（1）HTML5 WebSocket API的JavaScript代码，（2）Java URLConnection API，或（3）Silverlight WebClient API，又称为"BEAST"攻击。通过支持受影响的协议和密码，服务器使客户端得到利用。

steps.html: 服务端不会减轻对BEAST的攻击。唯一的选择是禁用受影响的协议(SSLv3和TLS 1.0)。最安全的配置是使用含关联数据的身份认证加密(AEAD)，例如TLS 1.2中的AES-GCM, AES-CCM。
steps.text: There is no server-side mitigation available against the BEAST attack. The only option is to disable the affected protocols (SSLv3 and TLS 1.0). The only fully safe configuration is to use Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD), e.g. AES-GCM, AES-CCM in TLS 1.2.

summary.html: 禁用SSLv2、SSLv3和TLS 1.0。最佳方法是只启用TLS 1.2。
summary.text: Disable SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLS 1.0. The best solution is to only have TLS 1.2 enabled

description.html: PCI (Payment Card Industry)数据安全标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。 除此之外，FIPS 140-2标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。

steps.html: 将服务器配置为要求客户端使用带有Associated Data (AEAD)功能的密码的经过身份验证的加密的TLS版本1.2。
steps.text: Configure the server to require clients to use TLS version 1.2 using Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) capable ciphers.

summary.html: 禁用不安全的TLS/SSL协议支持
summary.text: Disable insecure TLS/SSL protocol support

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: TLS/SSL时序旁道攻击,即"Lucky Thirteen"攻击

description.html:
OpenSSL、OpenJDK、PolarSSL和其他产品中使用的 TLS 协议1.1和1.2以及 DTLS 协议1.0和1.2，在处理格式错误的CBC填充期间对MAC检查需求没有适当地考虑定时边信道攻击， 允许远程攻击者通过对特制数据包的定时数据的统计分析来进行区分攻击和明文恢复攻击，也就是“幸运十三人” 问题。 包含了以前的填充预言攻击的对策的 SSL 3.0和TLS 1.0的实现方案也可能发生这种攻击。 变体攻击也可能适用于不合规的实现。由于无法确定某个特定的SSL产品或此类产品的易受攻击版本是否在端点上处于活动状态，因此运行CBC密码套件的所有SSL端点都被标记为可能存在漏洞; 因此他们应该由最终用户进行调查。

OpenSSL、OpenJDK、PolarSSL和其他产品中使用的 TLS 协议1.1和1.2以及 DTLS 协议1.0和1.2，在处理格式错误的CBC填充期间对MAC检查需求没有适当地考虑定时边信道攻击， 允许远程攻击者通过对特制数据包的定时数据的统计分析来进行区分攻击和明文恢复攻击，也就是“幸运十三人” 问题。 包含了以前的填充预言攻击的对策的 SSL 3.0和TLS 1.0的实现方案也可能发生这种攻击。 变体攻击也可能适用于不合规的实现。由于无法确定某个特定的SSL产品或此类产品的易受攻击版本是否在端点上处于活动状态，因此运行CBC密码套件的所有SSL端点都被标记为可能存在漏洞；因此他们应该由最终用户进行调查。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: TLS/SSL时序旁道攻击,即"Lucky Thirteen"攻击

steps.html:
以下列表显示发布的版本补丁。安装补丁版本或最新版本。

  • OpenSSL: 1.0.1d, 1.0.0k和0.9.8y
  • NSS: 3.14.3
  • GnuTLS: 2.12.23, 3.0.28和3.1.7
  • PolarSSL: 1.2.5
  • CyaSSL: 2.5.0
  • MatrixSSL: 3.4.1
  • BouncyCastle: 1.48
  • Oracle (Java):已解决JavaSE的特殊重要补丁更新中的攻击released 19/02/2013.

如果补丁不能配置服务器以使用GCM密码和禁用CBC密码。也就是说，使用含 Associated Data (AEAD),例如AES-GCM, AES-CCM的验证加密。
steps.text:
The following list shows for which version patches were released. Install the patched version or the latest version.

  * OpenSSL: 1.0.1d, 1.0.0k and 0.9.8y

  * NSS: 3.14.3

  * GnuTLS: 2.12.23, 3.0.28 and 3.1.7

  * PolarSSL: 1.2.5

  * CyaSSL: 2.5.0

  * MatrixSSL: 3.4.1

  * BouncyCastle: 1.48

  * Oracle (Java): the attacks are addressed in a special critical patch update of JavaSE, released 19/02/2013 (http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/javacpufeb2013update-1905892.html).

If patches are not available configure the server to use GCM ciphers and disable CBC ciphers. In other words, use Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD), e.g. AES-GCM, AES-CCM.

summary.html: 禁用CBC密码套件的TLS/SSL支持或给密码套件库打补丁
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for CBC cipher suites or patch the cipher suite library

description.html: PCI (Payment Card Industry)数据安全标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。 除此之外，FIPS 140-2标准要求至少TLS v1.1版本，推荐TLS v1.2版本。

steps.html: 将服务器配置为要求客户端使用带有Associated Data (AEAD)功能的密码的经过身份验证的加密的TLS版本1.2。
steps.text: Configure the server to require clients to use TLS version 1.2 using Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data (AEAD) capable ciphers.

summary.html: 禁用不安全的TLS/SSL协议支持
summary.text: Disable insecure TLS/SSL protocol support

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: TLS/SSL服务器支持使用静态密钥

description.html: 服务器配置为支持称为静态密钥密码的密码。这些密码不支持"Forward Secrecy"。在HTTP/2的新规范中，这些密码已被列入黑名单。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: TLS/SSL服务器支持使用静态密钥

配置服务器以禁用对静态密钥密码套件的支持。

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章

有关禁用静态密钥密码套件的说明，请查看245030。

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

Configure the server to disable support for static key cipher suites.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling static key cipher suites. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

summary.html: 禁用竞态密钥密码套件的TLS/SSL支持
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for static key cipher suites

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: TLS/SSL服务器X.509证书中存在基于SHA-1签名

description.html: SHA-1 哈希算法的弱点揭露其碰撞攻击, 可能允许攻击者产生额外的X.509数字证书具有相同的签名 作为源语言。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: TLS/SSL服务器X.509证书中存在基于SHA-1签名

steps.html: 停止使用依赖于SHA-1签名算法，如"SHA1withRSA"，签署X.509证书时使用SHA-2系列（SHA-224，SHA-256，SHA-384和SHA-512）来替代。
steps.text: Stop using signature algorithms relying on SHA-1, such as "SHA1withRSA", when signing X.509 certificates. Instead, use the SHA-2 family (SHA-224, SHA-256, SHA-384, and SHA-512).

summary.html: 停止使用SHA-1
summary.text: Stop Using SHA-1

description.html: 远程主机响应TCP的一个时间戳。TCP时间戳响应可用于近似远程主机的正常运行时间，从而潜在地有助于进一步的攻击。此外，一些操作系统根据它们的TCP时间戳的行为可以留下指纹。

steps.html:
运行以下命令，禁用TCP时间戳：

no ip tcp timestamp
steps.text:
Run the following command to disable TCP timestamps: 


      no ip tcp timestamp

summary.html: 禁用Cisco的TCP时间戳响应
summary.text: Disable TCP timestamp responses on Cisco

steps.html:
通过以下命令，将net.inet.tcp.rfc1323值设置为0：

sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

此外，将以下值放在默认sysctl配置文件中，一般情况下，sysctl.conf：

net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0
steps.text:
Set the value of net.inet.tcp.rfc1323 to 0 by running the following command:


      sysctl -w net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0
    

 Additionally, put the following value in the default sysctl configuration file, generally sysctl.conf:


      net.inet.tcp.rfc1323=0

description.html: 传输层安全（TLS）版本1.0（RFC 2246）和1.1（RFC 4346）包括基于3DES（三重数据加密标准）算法的密码套件。       由于3DES仅提供112位的有效安全性，因此被认为接近于某些机构的使用寿命。 因此，3DES算法不包括在TLS版本1.3的规范中。       ECRYPT II（从2012年起）建议独立长期保护的通用应用程序至少128位安全。德国的BSI（从2015年起）和法国的ANSSI（从2014年）也有相同的建议，128位是推荐的对称尺寸，在2020年后应该是强制性的。虽然NIST（2012年）仍然认为直到2030年底3DES适合使用。

steps.html:
配置服务器以禁用对3DES套件的支持。

对于Microsoft IIS Web服务器，请参阅Microsoft知识库文章           有关禁用3DES加密套件的说明，请查看 245030 。

以下建议的配置提供了更高级别的安全性。 此配置与Firefox 27，Chrome 22，IE 11，Opera 14和Safari 7兼容。此配置不推荐使用SSLv2，SSLv3和TLSv1协议。 而是使用TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2协议。

请参阅服务器供应商文档以应用推荐的密码配置：

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK
steps.text:
Configure the server to disable support for 3DES suite.

For Microsoft IIS web servers, see Microsoft Knowledgebase article 245030 (http://support.microsoft.com/kb/245030/) for instructions on disabling 3DES cipher suite. 

The following recommended configuration provides a higher level of security. This configuration is compatible with Firefox 27, Chrome 22, IE 11, Opera 14 and Safari 7. SSLv2, SSLv3, and TLSv1 protocols are not recommended in this configuration. Instead, use TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 protocols.

Refer to your server vendor documentation to apply the recommended cipher configuration:

ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384:DHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES128-GCM-SHA256:kEDH+AESGCM:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256:ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384:ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA:DHE-DSS-AES128-SHA256:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA256:DHE-DSS-AES256-SHA:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:!aNULL:!eNULL:!EXPORT:!DES:!RC4:!3DES:!MD5:!PSK

summary.html: 对3DES密码套件禁用TLS/SSL支持
summary.text: Disable TLS/SSL support for 3DES cipher suite
